Sentencas: The performance of a solid-state electrochemical system depends critically on the transport process in the bulk phases as well as the mass transfer and charge transfer across interfaces.
Titulo: CONSIDERATIONS IN DESIGN AND CHARACTERIZATION OF SOLID-STATE ELECTROCHEMICAL SYSTEMS

Sentencas: The bulk transport process, such as diffusion under a chemical potential gradient and migration under an electric field, is relatively well-understood and property characterized.
Titulo: CONSIDERATIONS IN DESIGN AND CHARACTERIZATION OF SOLID-STATE ELECTROCHEMICAL SYSTEMS

Sentencas: The phenomena occurring at an interface, however, have received little attention due either to the lack of understanding of these processes or to the experimental difficulty with determination of the interfacial properties.
Titulo: CONSIDERATIONS IN DESIGN AND CHARACTERIZATION OF SOLID-STATE ELECTROCHEMICAL SYSTEMS

Sentencas: Although interfacial phenomena are far more complex in nature than bulk transport processes, their effect on the system performance is becoming more and more important, particularly for systems involving thin-film electrolytes or for operation at low temperatures.
Titulo: CONSIDERATIONS IN DESIGN AND CHARACTERIZATION OF SOLID-STATE ELECTROCHEMICAL SYSTEMS

Sentencas: In both cases, the kinetics of interfacial processes dominate the performance characteristics.
Titulo: CONSIDERATIONS IN DESIGN AND CHARACTERIZATION OF SOLID-STATE ELECTROCHEMICAL SYSTEMS

Sentencas: This paper addresses considerations in analysis and characterization of interfacial phenomena in solid-state electrochemical systems.
Titulo: CONSIDERATIONS IN DESIGN AND CHARACTERIZATION OF SOLID-STATE ELECTROCHEMICAL SYSTEMS

Sentencas: The physical significance and characteristics of these processes are demonstrated in solid oxide fuel cells, oxygen sensors, and thermoelectric generators based on solid electrolytes.
Titulo: CONSIDERATIONS IN DESIGN AND CHARACTERIZATION OF SOLID-STATE ELECTROCHEMICAL SYSTEMS

Sentencas: Furthermore, approaches to improve the interfacial properties and to optimize system performance are also illustrated.
Titulo: CONSIDERATIONS IN DESIGN AND CHARACTERIZATION OF SOLID-STATE ELECTROCHEMICAL SYSTEMS
